changelog:
v1.4.0 Beta
- Major codebase refactoring for improved stability and maintainability
- Multi-source document processing (load and compare multiple documents)
- Ollama local AI integration with guided setup and hardware detection
- Dictation support (speech-to-text input)
- Handwriting recognition via OCR
- Web content extraction from a wide range of online sources
- Multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek, Ollama)
- YouTube transcript extraction
- PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, RTF, CSV, JSON, Markdown support
- OCR for scanned documents and images
- Audio/video transcription (local and cloud)
- Conversation threading with branching
- Document library with semantic search
- Prompt management library
- Cost tracking across providers
- Comprehensive export options
